website_summaries.verdict: The preset sensor menu and sound mute are 2 priceless features.
pros: Along with 10 power settings, a large digital display, and power-saving mode, this model is also  one of the quietest countertop microwaves on the market
Users also love the sturdy pull-handle design
cons: The power level function can be tough to navigate, and the light flickers at times

customer_reviews.title: I hoped it would last at least ONE year!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I bought this on 12/13/2018. It's now 12/5/2019 and I just brought in a replacement microwave from my doorstep. The plastic coating started peeling off the numbers in a matter of months. A week ago, it started to making an awful racket and we believe it's the turntable. Anyway, pathetic. The real shame is that it's yet another thing that will end up in our landfills.
customer_reviews.author: SnowKnitty

customer_reviews.title: Worthless after one year
customer_reviews.text: We bought this microwave when we moved to a new house a little over a year ago. It worked great! Then a couple of days ago the interior light went out. It still works, but you can't see what's going on while cooking anymore. I called Toshiba about a replacement light and was informed that no replacement light was available and that I would have to buy a new microwave. It was so inexpensive to begin with I should have known it wouldn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Microwave stopped working on day 39
customer_reviews.text: Microwave stopped heating anything 9 days after Amazon one month return window. I spent a long time chatting with product support, trying different solutions, including him wanting me to take the cabinet off. He said there is a one year warranty; however, I would need to ship it back for repair. I think that is unreasonable. I believe Amazon or Toshiba should appreciate their customers and have ups pick up this one and bring a new one the same day.
customer_reviews.author: kgwg

customer_reviews.title: Very quite
customer_reviews.text: I really like this microwave so far just after a few weeks of use. It looks nice and best thing is how quite it is... Only items I have issue with is fact that only front is stainless (which I think is similar case for other microwaves) & some of the controls take getting used to. Otherwise very good.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel vs BLACK Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Stainless Steel version unaware that they are referring ONLY to the front bezel/face of the microwave. The top and sides are still black. The description they use is "Stainless Steel finish" vs "Black Stainless Steel exterior" for the two models which is kind of confusing and somewhat misleading. If this was an over the range type that is installed in a cabinet it obviously would not be an issue but, this is a countertop model. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Makes horrible loud vibrating noise
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for the first few weeks....and then, suddenly one day, it began making an extremely loud vibration noise within 5 seconds of operation on ANY setting. It still, however, works. I need to contact the manufacturer, but if it wasn't for that noise, I'd give it a high rating
customer_reviews.author: NY Mews

customer_reviews.title: A MODERN MACHINE WITH TOSHIBA QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I just threw out my last microwave after an astounding 40-year run! I kid you not. In 1979, it was a top end SAMSUNG I bought from a neighbor who no longer needed it. But to the product at hand, I chose this Toshiba model for it's brand recognition and quality. The 1100 watts gives me plenty of power to play with. In fact, surprising power! Toshiba's 1100 watts of today exceeds in performance, in my opinion, the 1500 watt rating of my old unit. It's scary effective, and apparently a best seller. Instructions for use are a tiny bit complicated, though well documented. And only Four Stars for the clunky, bang-shut door when closing.
customer_reviews.author: wrdplayy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate purchased in may-now august and there is condensation between the two pieces of glass. 60 day warranty is up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R. Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Food cold after 5 minutes in the middle.
customer_reviews.text: November 27th 2019 this is the worst microwave ever. I am pissed off that I threw the Box away. Do not buy this microwave. It takes forever to heat and if food doesn't stay hot it gets cold very quick. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: penny sanders

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this microwave in Nov and now it doesnt work only after 2mos of having it
customer_reviews.author: Charrisme

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: We loved it until it started having strange issues: (1) plastic control panel bubbled; (2) I prefer to cook at lower than full power level because you can heat without really cooking but sometimes it simply won't turn off without being unplugged! (3) other times it simply doesn't work--have to unplug, then replug, then it works. This can be tricky since it's on a shelf above the counter. Called in on my warranty because all happened when only about 6 months old. They sent a refund check rather than a replacement. Still using with periodic issues. I would not recommend this oven.
customer_reviews.author: NM Marj

customer_reviews.title: Would  I buy again? Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Everytime I buy something its on sale the next day. bought this microwave for 118 It's on sale omg. Anyway great microwave love it. There is this strong smell like plastic when opening. In 2 minutes it was boiling water love it.
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is a piece of junk. The light bulb burnt out inside it in less than a year. It is also making a weird noise when the tray rotated inside when you have it on and is now not heating our food very well. Needless to say I wish I could return this to get my money back because it is not a good quality item at all.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Frey

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet, can disable the chimes
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through many microwave ovens in 10 years. Most are too noisy, especially the chimes which rarely can be disabled. The door opens and closes quietly (doesn't use the usual noisy push button to open). Push the "8" button for several seconds until it beeps to turn off the beeper. Do the same to turn it back on. This 1100W unit cooks evenly, unlike my former 1200W Panasonic Inverter model.
customer_reviews.author: Retired vet in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Well Thought Out
customer_reviews.text: This could be the perfect microwave oven. Numbers are easy to see unlike most microwaves. The add 30 seconds is backgrounded in yellow and the stop in red at the bottom. So easy to spot. 1-6 buttons are auto actuated. Runs super quite. Wasn't sure it was working. Cooks nice and even. All kinds of special microwave settings. Five rings when food is done. I like the large handle for opening and closing. Small footprint. Large enough for almost anything you might want to microwave. Stainless steel looks great on the counter. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan J.

customer_reviews.title: Stoped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microwave in Oct/18. Today July 23/2018 it stopped working. Its not heating anything. Please save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit Lall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Baking Potatoes, and Intuitive Functionality
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research for this, and chose the Toshiba EM131A5C-SS for its simplicity, relative price, and good reviews. I really like the front handle and the intuitiveness of functions most of all. I can do a quick start in :30 increments or a customized time, and the pre-set for potatoes is perfect for a small-to-medium sized Idaho potato. I had to add a little more for a big potato, but it came out very evenly-cooked. No tough or black ends. Potatoes and reheating is my #1 use of a microwave. It's even easy to set the clock and start or mute the touchpad beeping. So far, very good!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Schwartzberg

customer_reviews.title: Two defective units in one week.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. The first one I ordered arrived visibly damaged with dent and a gap between door unit and main unit. Key pad would not work and unit would not turn off. Asked for replacement. Second unit arrived unscathed but keypad would not work again and it turned on when you closed the door. Upon closer inspection I saw that this too had the same gap between the door unit and main microwave. This is a manufacturing problem. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: ponageman

customer_reviews.title: This is a pile of scrap.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived totally trashed. Big dent in the bottom, wouldn't even sit level. The door was hanging, big dent in the top and one side. I didn't dare even plug it in. I returned it for a full refund. What a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Anderson

customer_reviews.title: on replacement oven , we called customer service
customer_reviews.text: Well the product flaw which was cook power level was not working..... actually does work, but you have to know what to do, cause manual does not give correct info. If you want to use power level, you must enter the "cook time" instead of power level. so instead of quick time or power level....first enter a cook time, then hit power level and choose the power level you desire. And rep did not immediately understand what were trying to discuss.
customer_reviews.author: grammyfierce

customer_reviews.title: It Just Arrived, So...
customer_reviews.text: ...I can't really say anything about performance yet. But it arrived with a big honking dent on the top edge on the side near controls. While I plan on keeping it (I don't have the strength to haul it up and down stairs and I can't be certain that one of my condo neighbors will be around to help) anyway and in general, I am not about appearance, I would suggest taking a look at a product before shipping it out in that state. I tested it on a cup of tea and it certainly heats quickly and evenly, so I think we are all good. Just...check for dents next time, okay????
customer_reviews.author: Yarnspinner

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Our last microwave lasted over 15 years. Still worked but the wheels had dug a rut into the bottom and it didn't seem safe. This one seemed good and was for the first 8 months. Then it started making noises that I cannot identify. And it does not heat as well as it used to. Gremlins are running amok in it I am afraid. So I guess I need to contact Toshiba. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid microwave oven
customer_reviews.text: This microwave oven has worked great so far. Cooking times are consistent and it's easy to use, although if you're someone who likes to be very specific with your timing settings, i.e. 2:17, then you need to realize that unlike many other ovens you have to go through a couple of steps to do this because hitting any of the numbered buttons starts the oven instantly for that many minutes. So if you started to type the 2:17 above, the microwave is going to turn on as soon as you hit "2" for 2:00 minutes. You have to do 'timed cooking' if you want to be specific, which is a bit annoying since it requires extra steps.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Stocker

customer_reviews.title: AS OF APRIL 15M 2020 THE MICROWAVE IS BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LIKE THE MICROWAVE AND AS OF YESTERDAY, WITH NORMAL WEAR AND TEAR OF ONE INDIVIDUAL THE MICROWAVE NO LONGER IS WORKING. IT NO LONGER COOKS ANYTHING. WHAT DO I DO? IT IS LESS THANK FOUR MONTH OLD. ARE YOU GOING TO ISSUE ME ANOTHER ONE AND I WILL RETERN THE DEAD ONE?
customer_reviews.author: GABY

customer_reviews.title: I should have replaced my old microwave ages ago
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because our old microwave was making crazy noises, wouldn't keep time on it's clock and we were afraid it would die and leave us with nothing in the middle of the pandemic. Toshiba is a good brand so we went with it and now I wish we'd done it a year ago. It's quiet, seems to have more power than our old one though the specs are the same and it has one touch time, so I don't have to spend extra time punching numbers in. My only disappointment was in the incredibly long wait for it to ship, but it was during the time Amazon wasn't shipping "non-essentials" so I couldn't be too upset about it.
customer_reviews.author: Always Happy

customer_reviews.title: Defrost is worthless
customer_reviews.text: The defrost on this oven is absolutely worthless. You might as well just turn it on to the regular heat and wait to pull it out. If you use any of their defrost settings, you'll totally destroy whatever it is you're trying defrost. Do you want to soften a frozen cube of butter? Hahahahaha. Use their recommended settings and your butter will be a puddle before you know it. This oven is way too powerful. It takes 30 seconds heat a cold cup of coffee to 3000 degrees celsius. Our 40-year-old microwave is a thousand times better. You can actually defrost something with cremating it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Clock doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Microwave was great out of the box, a huge improvement over our last microwave. However, periodically it does not heat correctly--not all the time, maybe 10% of the time, it is like the power is not working, though it looks like everything is fine, but the food will be ice cold. The other problem is that the clock consistently runs fast, so that the clock is hours ahead. Again, it was fine out of the box, but after about a month of use, it is not working correctly. Think twice about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jmcnulty

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave
customer_reviews.text: Surprised how quiet it is. Love the feature that you can remove the beeps and have it quiet when it's done. It does the job and heats my food and heats up a cup of tea and cooks my frozen meatballs. Love the stainless steel finish and so far it washs up nice. Fits nicely in a built in shelf within my kitchen cabinets. Not to big and not to small. I've had every size and realized this is the only size you need.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Nic
customer_reviews.text: Item looks very nice. I love the stainless steel and black combo. Good size and wattage for the price range. The Amazon shipping however is TERRIBLE. I waited over 3 WEEKS for it to finally arrive DAMAGED. I'd love to find a replacement elsewhere, but for now I get to lug this heavy thing back to the post office....
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba EM131A5C-SS Microwave Oven with Smart Sensor
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Use it about once a day. Noisier than my previous microwave, however, has been working well. ADDITIONAL NOTE: 8/9/2019 - BUYERS BEWARE- almost one year after purchasing suddenly the turntable mechanism is making scraping and loud noises. Its is quite annoying and should NOT be happening on a product less than 1 year old and used about 5-7 times per week to heat up a meal. Disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Mike E.

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: just received today, does not work correctly. Noise like a car with a bad transmission. poor quality control. poor quality.returning and buying somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: don thompson

customer_reviews.title: Size & Performance are the key words here
customer_reviews.text: The size & perofmance are great. A little disappointed as I believe thought when it is described I bing stainless steel entirely. It 's door is the only stainless, the rest of the cabinet is black steel. The Haier brand is stainless on the inside as well. Don't know how tghey do it to prevent sparks but take whatever I can get.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Weglarz

customer_reviews.title: OOPS
customer_reviews.text: I live in a HOME where meals are served. When I received the microwave, I put water in it to make sure it works. I did not use it until a couple of days ago when I warmed up left over chicken bits from the refrigerator for my dog. The microwave started to spark around the food and a small flame evolved by the food. When I opened it up a lot of smoke came out. A couple of days ago I tried it again. I warmed up some ham bits from the refrigerator when basically the same thing happened flames and all. I am returning the microwave for these reasons.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Catastrophic failure in less than 2 years of normal use
customer_reviews.text: We are amazed that in less than 2 years of normal use the oven suffered catastrophic failure for no apparent reason. We were unable to reach anyone from Toshiba or Amazon that could offer a solution. We're in need of replacement now, very disappointing. I Spoke with Manual, customer service manager at Media the parent company for Microwave products for Toshiba who stonewalled me with no offer of resolution. So! buyer beware Toshiba isn't what we thought it was when quality and standing behind their product is concerned. Pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My microwave gave out during the early part of our shut-down and I couldn't go out to purchase a new microwave unit. I found this one and it had good reviews so I purchased it. All the reviews I read are true, the unit is small, which I need, easy to use and very quiet. One of the most important items was that the buttons were in a similar pattern to my old microwave. They are and work very easily. Another plus is that it was delivered to my house so I didn't have to worry about trying to move a heavy unit out of a store and into my house.
customer_reviews.author: TSK

customer_reviews.title: Good features, questionable engineering.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this microwave at first, but I'm questioning its quality now. Its quiet and nice looking, but when I started cleaning it, I discovered a flaw that makes it much less safe. If you lift up on the door, it triggers a relay that starts the microwave. It doesn't start while opened but grabbing the handle or the base of the door both start the microwave. A hair trigger relay should not be so close to a moving object. The rest of its good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turntable glass cracked
customer_reviews.text: Turntable glass cracked within few months and I am contacting amazon and Toshiba but didn't get the glass replaced.Have used so many microwave and I never had this cracking issue before.Defintetly would not recommend this
customer_reviews.author: TanCk

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during self quarantine because our 18 year old GE hood microwave decided to die. We felt this micro would be a good option for us under the current situation. Now a little after a week it started smoking and completely stopped working. Sending it back now is not an option. All the reviews seemed good must just got a lemon .
customer_reviews.author: Peter L Keeler

customer_reviews.title: Not a great model
customer_reviews.text: The power button doesn't work and it makes weird noises when it's running. I didn't really read the reviews before I bought it thinking Toshiba couldn't possibly go wrong with a microwave. I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sweeney Mae

customer_reviews.title: Nice alll around.
customer_reviews.text: Love this microwave. Doesn’t take up a ton of counter space, handle makes it easy to open, nice 30 second fast button. I don’t use a ton of features but the ones I have used I liked. The interior light is really nice to have on when you open the door as well as when the food is being cooked.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good unit but has minor issues
customer_reviews.text: Well working microwave, but the final fitment & finish are a bit off, with the most obvious problem being the misalignment of the door. The door is misaligned about 1/8th inch, but this doesn't seems to affect the function of the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: I like my Toshiba for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: Quick heat-ups are great..haven't used anything else yet. The APPLIANCE CORD should be at least 4-5 inches LONGER to reach base-board wall outlets. Everyone doesn't have a contemporary, state-of-the-art kitchen! I'd hoped to place the microwave on TOP of the counter, not on the middle section..inconvenient having to stoop to use it esp. those of us with less than perfect backs! My growing concern is learning the number of CONTROLS in the manual..I feel like I'm studying for an exam LOL But, if I'm gonna use the features, I'll learn them ALL! Still pleased that I bought it..so far. Btw. I have NO complaints about the 5 beeps when heating's done. Good product.. just needs longer cord. Thanx Ms. MS
customer_reviews.author: Maxine R.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Function, Right Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: I should have known this was a lemon when the interior light lit up as soon as it was plugged in. The "Start" button doesn't work. Lots of bells and whistles to input, but, on every single attempt, the start button does not engage the oven. Wonder if I will end up a satisfied customer. I doubt it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended - has too many default settings
customer_reviews.text: While the Toshiba microwave eventually gets the job done, it is very irritating to use because it has too many default settings. For example, if you want to microwave an item for 30 seconds, you can't just tap out "30" on the timed settings and hit "start." You'll get 3 minutes or sometimes 30 minutes. To override this default setting, you have to find the tiny touch button that says "cook time," hit this button and then tap the time you want. Same with the popcorn setting. You have to tap the "popcorn" touch button twice or you'll be lucky if half your bag of microwave popcorn pops. Definitely not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Beadles

customer_reviews.title: microwave
customer_reviews.text: My biggest complaint is as new as it is I noticed what I thought was dirt on the 1 button. So I started to clean it realized it is a plastic coating., So now I have this plastic that is open in the middle of the one and I will never buy this company product again. I got it for the name but They really should replace it with something that will last moire than 3 months
customer_reviews.author: Tina Paytes

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 36 days
customer_reviews.text: 6 days after return window closed, the microwave sparked and had a burnt smell.
customer_reviews.author: Dr B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, sensor mode does great, and the sound mute mode is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I never knew I would like a microwave that didn't beep, but I love it! If you hold the 8 button for while, the unit will beep once, and you will never hear another sound until you turn the beeps back on. It's refreshing to not have a loud beep. The sensor modes cook evenly and popcorn mode is spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher.C

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this powerful microwave.
customer_reviews.text: Taking into consideration what the other reviewers wrote, I launched and purchased this microwave, knowing I need to trial and error defrost and cook times because it is a rather powerful unit. After experimenting with different foods (defrost and cook), I found this to be a very good purchase for the price. My best advice is to read the directions regarding the controls and settings, but not to follow the recommended or preset timings, lest you end up with overcooked, dried out foods.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Maybe go to Walmart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my RV. It wasn’t used for a couple of months. When I did need to use it, the unit wouldn’t work properly. After calling Amazon, I’m past my 3 month time. So they referred me to Toshiba. (3 different numbers) When I spoke to Toshiba, they need a receipt to determine if it’s under warranty. (Purchase date of 1/7/2920) I call Amazon back and now they send me a link so I can print the invoice off. So...now I’ll present this invoice to Toshiba and let them determine if it’s under warranty and after their determination, send me a check in 7-10 business days. All I wanted was a darn $110. Microwave!!!
customer_reviews.author: michael g

customer_reviews.title: like the handle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my elderly mother whose fingers are becoming too weak to use a push button door opener. The handle is perfect for her. Because of extremely low vision, I added bumps in strategic places for her to use the keypad. She loves the "Add 30 seconds" feature.
customer_reviews.author: PKR

customer_reviews.title: Finally a working unit and I have to admit I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I received this microwave, plugged it in and it started to run and wouldn't shut off except when I opened the door. None of the buttons did anything. Called Toshiba, they said it was defective. Returned it to Amazon, got a replacement, and the replacement wouldn't turn on at all! So the second one went back and I requested a refund. However due to miscommunication (?) replacement came instead. I figured I had nothing to lose, so plugged it in and BINGO! It works fine, and after a month no problems. I do like it. Just wish it worked out right the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Mother124

customer_reviews.title: We love the price and quality of the microwave
customer_reviews.text: A great microwave oven can cook food and heat food. Think: Not just popcorn and leftovers, but steamed veggies, like spaghetti squash, “baked” potatoes, and crispy bacon that’ll rival the cooking results you get from your range — not to mention it’ll do it two to five times faster. Plus, once you learn how to poach eggs in the microwave, you might also finally stop trying to learn how to the old-fashioned way.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 7 months of use
customer_reviews.text: This microwave worked fine for the first 7 months, then all of a sudden stopped working. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fallon Baker

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this microwave in July 2019 and after 8 months it started smoking and smelling. We are a 2 person household. Almost all other microwaves we've purchased have lasted for years before needing to replace. I wish I had read the 1-Star Reviews before purchasing this one.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Lavoie

customer_reviews.title: Not working properly
customer_reviews.text: The size and price of the Toshiba L Series 1100 watt microwave were fine. I set it up according to the manual (very easy) and right away it was making a noticeable knocking sound. It sounds like the turnstyle component is malfunctioning. The turnstyle rotates but makes a loud knocking sound. The noise is the same with or without the glass plate. I have tried to reach Amazon for product help, but their webpage is not recognizing my telephone number entered. Since I am unable to get help, I will likely return it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C

customer_reviews.title: Beware:  1100 watt 2020 model not as powerful as 1990 1000 watt
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the presets are useless. Like warming rice - really, 20-plus minutes? Major disappointment is that we thought, when our circa 1990 microwave died, we were upgrading from a 1000 to an 1100. Uh, no. This takes longer for the same jobs. Not the most intuitive trying to use some of the features, but a lot of that has to do with what one is used to. For its footprint and price, it contains all the basic functions (defrost, power level settings, etc) and is a fully functional if not totally intuitive gadget. No regrets on the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RagsToRags

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this microwave! We bought this one to replace a smaller one and this is the perfect size. it fits on the countertop just right. You can see in it without bending over too much, it is so easy to clean, the door opens and closes easily (no hard pushing or pulling). This microwave cooks everything faster and more evenly than out last one. I also love that when the food is done and the beeping begins, once you open the door the beeping stops. Our last one kept beeping.I just love this microwave! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Piano-lady

customer_reviews.title: If you need a microwave for only 13 months this one is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This microwave worked well for 13 months. In month 14 it started burning the food. It was an awful smell. The sparks and fire were a nice touch. Toshiba would not stand behind the product. The warranty is 12 months long, tough luck if it breaks in month 14. I’m left with a broken product to dispose of, wasted time on the phone with Toshiba and no microwave. Is this how you see your life unfolding? It does not have to end this way if you pick another high speed food heating appliance for your stunning kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Angus

customer_reviews.title: Love that I can turn off the buzzer and close door quietly
customer_reviews.text: I've had this microwave for 6 months and love it. I turned off the buzzer sound and I can close the door quietly when I use the handle so I no longer worry about the loud sounds waking someone who is sleeping. The controls are easy to use and visible - I could never see the controls well on our old unit. It does everything I need a microwave for, I really don't cook in a microwave, just reheat, and the settings are easy to use for that. It takes up less space than my old unit which is great. I love this microwave and would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: old enough to know

customer_reviews.title: So far excellent free standing microwave
customer_reviews.text: Easily turn off timer noise and is fast powerful cooking with easy preset just by pressing the minute buttons. After having a home with top of the line appliances, right now I have to say this surpasses what I had there and works well in an apartment. It seldom shows fingerprints on stainless handle. So far it's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: L K

customer_reviews.title: Potential buyer beware....
customer_reviews.text: For two weeks this microwave performed as expected. However, it lost its oven light after two weeks and we lived with it. Now six months later it is squealing and whistling while it heats. It makes us feel unsafe in the kitchen. Definitely, this unit is a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Need to return
customer_reviews.text: Though all electric requirements are met, the oven makes the power go off and I would like to return it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Bill J. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Carousel malfunctions and makes noise sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Every once in a while the carousel doesn't operate properly and it makes an unpleasant noise. This isn't from it being dirty. It did it on day 1. We thought about returning it but then we'd have to be without a microwave for however long that return would take and with 3 boys that eat constantly... not an easy option. The malfunction is intermittent so we live with it, but it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud beeping - Buttons no longer working
customer_reviews.text: It has been one year since the purchase of this microwave. When it first arrived, I wanted to turn off the cooking completed buzz, but the button for that did not work. I checked the manual and online to find out if I needed to use a combination of buttons, but nothing was indicated. Yesterday, the entire bottom row of buttons stopped working. Why I don't like this microwave: 1. I prefer to enter my own cooking time. Each number is pre-programmed and you have to remember to choose "customize cooking time" button to enter your own time. 2. Loud beeps for each button push and cooking completion. 3. Panel is difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A. Ousselin

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this microwave to fit our space in our new house. When we plugged it in, it started up immediately. The problem is that it doesn't turn off and none of the buttons work. Totally useless. We contacted Amazon and they refused to issue a refund because we moved into our new house and unboxed the microwave two weeks after the 30-day return window closed. Instead, they sent us to deal with the manufacturer. Next time, we'll buy from a store where we can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Summer25

customer_reviews.title: A great microwave
customer_reviews.text: Our over the stove microwave died so we ordered this one from Amazon since we are still in isolation. We are very happy with it. The handle is easy to open and close. We use the 30 second start button that is white quite frequently. It's great for microwave popcorn since you can put in the size of the bag. We don't cook in the microwave but rather just reheat food or coffee. The defrost works well. We look forward to trying the melt butter function though. Suggest keeping the manual handy to use all it's functions.
customer_reviews.author: jude

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it's alleged high rating
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this Toshiba Microwave. It doesn't deserve a good rating. The clock has to be constantly re-set. All I have to do is open the door when cooking is done and the clock screen goes blank. At least it cooks food. Will not buy a Toshiba product again. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good at doing what it needs to do
customer_reviews.text: The one thing that I thought we were getting was a stainless sided microwave. Nope...guess I didn't read the description well enough....it comes with black sides and top. From about 10 feet away you can't even tell though. From a performance standpoint, it works as advertised. I can't say it is anything special as I have not really seen any bells and whistles on it. But it does a respectable job at heating food and defrosting frozen meats. Would I recommend? Sure, it seems to be reasonable for the money. It is fairly compact and will fit in most counters.
customer_reviews.author: Sean F

customer_reviews.title: Crap - do not purchase from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: POS...I previously purchased a microwave from Walmart that lasted me almost ten years. This one lasted a little over six MONTHS and just stopped - no power to it (tried multiple plugs). I will never buy from Amazon again. Now I'm stuck without a microwave and no way of getting refund because it is outside of 30-day return period. This is the second small appliance from Amazon that just stopped working six months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M Vowells

customer_reviews.title: Has a shot in electrical system
customer_reviews.text: Hate it . microwave starts on its own, with no time showing, but running. also starts when you shut the door sometimes. But now its too late for return. will not bbuy this brand again,
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Blassingame

customer_reviews.title: Seems defective
customer_reviews.text: Have had this 2 months and am regretting it. Things randomly explode in it even on the 30 second quick start. Have to push button sequence for an eternity to try and set to melt, and won't. You shouldn't be afraid to use a appliance because you don't now if your food will explode and make huge mess all the time. Never had such a crappy microwave before.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and works very well.
customer_reviews.text: My old microwave (West Bend) still worked except it had rusted inside with flaking paint. This Toshiba has an inside finish that looks as though it will hold up much better. The controls are easy to figure out and the manual is simple to figure out. It is spacious, quiet, and attractive stainless steel. So far I’m very pleased with it! Hopefully it will last a lot longer than the much cheaper one I had. It’s true that you get what you pay for, and this is a little more expensive, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: J Quinlan

customer_reviews.title: Usefulness
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks and ease of operation. Heats up better than the one that just quit on me and it was 1250 watts, where this one is 1100 watts and seems to heat just as fast if not faster. So far fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: big foot

customer_reviews.title: PLEASED SO FAR
customer_reviews.text: The microwave I bought about a year ago had a button you pushed to open the door. The button broke after about eight months....The microwave I had before that had a handle. I got that microwave from my girl friends mother died 18 years ago...........So this time I bought the Toshiba because it has a handle to open the door. My girlfriend and I are both 75 and hopefully it is our last one.
customer_reviews.author: CHARLES

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! Bought in October and it is loud!! And it don't work
customer_reviews.author: John Newman

customer_reviews.title: I love the microwave oven with a door handle
customer_reviews.text: I love the microwave oven with a door handle. It works much better than my last microwave which had a push button to open the front door. It subsequently got stuck. So far no complaints, and it was a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good Microwave for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this when our last one abruptly died. This one cooks faster than the one we had previously, and it does so with less noise. One feature I really like about it is, once you open the door the tones that sound at the end of cooking, stop; our previous oven would do all five tones no matter whether or not the door was opened. The only stainless steel here is the trim on the front; the rest is painted mild steel. Good buy for the price. Will see how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: 707Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this microwave a little over a year ago but wanted to get some use in before leaving a review. This microwave is great for small spaces but just as great for the average size dinner plate. Easy to clean but that could because of my plate cover. Great for the price. I plan on bringing it with me to my next apartment (1st apt purchase)
customer_reviews.author: O'Niel

customer_reviews.title: Work Horse of Microwaves and Smart
customer_reviews.text: This is the work horse of microwave ovens. I love the pull handle verses a push button. Love the beep silence mode. Cook a few frozen entrees and the cooked to perfection using the sensor mode. It really can sense and cooks the food until it is done. No need to stop stir and continue guessing. Nope just press a button and when it says it’s ready it’s ready. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Aireal

customer_reviews.title: It didn't last but 1 day
customer_reviews.text: We hooked up this microwave and it only worked for 1 day.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Smaller Microwave
customer_reviews.text: What an outstanding, small microwave! At 1100W it replaced an older 700W in use for many years. Of course this one updates the technology tremendously - from the "auto" buttons to sound, efficiency and functionality. The price was one of the lowest around - including comparison to Costco appliances. Great Buy and machine!
customer_reviews.author: RCA

customer_reviews.title: Sparks when heating and not consistant heating.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in November 2018 and It has never heated properly. and Now it is shooting sparks when heating anything up. This is an unreliable product for heat consistency and use. And EXTREAMLY DANGEROUS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: "BIG TIME JUNK"
customer_reviews.text: JUNK 2 MONTHS VIBRATES RIGHT OFF THE COUNTER, OF COURSE IT IS BEYOND THE 30 DAY RETURN NEVER BUY FROM THEM AGAIN OR ANY OF THERE PRODUCTS SHOULD BE A LAW AGAINST THEM FROM SELLING IN US
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD C.

customer_reviews.title: I’d look at other models if I were you.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not impressed with this microwave. The clock stopped working after 3 days and it looks like an older model.
customer_reviews.author: K. Shuster

customer_reviews.title: Requires min 12 inches top clearance. Not for most older kitchens.
customer_reviews.text: Many requirements for placement, not listed on Amazon, like 12” top clearance, one end open, etc
customer_reviews.author: MAGA

customer_reviews.title: Loud and doesn't cook evenly. Outside burnt awhile center is raw
customer_reviews.text: This microwave looks nice and is easy to use BUT it is very loud, takes forever to cook for the wattage. It cos so unevenly that if you put a plate of food in the oven, the outsides will be burnt while the middle is cold. I've had a number of microwaves and this is the worst performance of any of them. Received it a month after ordering so can't return but it's the last Toshiba I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Many features at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I waited to review this product. Number 1: The keypad took a while to get used to. Not touch-friendly. Number 2: The roller ring under the turntable was very noisy at first. I actually removed it (which the directions say not to do). At some point after several months, I tried using it again and it operated quietly. Not sure why. The features that I have tried all seem to work fine. I would recommend this turntable, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: KBarber11

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions aren't accurate
customer_reviews.text: Beware for those of you trying to fit this in a cupboard, the 12.8 height is only the height of the unit, not including the feet. The unit itself is over 13.5" tall.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Goldsberry

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Better popcorn
customer_reviews.text: When you have a bad microwave you really notice it. But this microwave, you hardly notice it because it cooks pretty evenly and quickly. We have noticed that microwave popcorn has come out better in this one. It also looks nice too
customer_reviews.author: Sapawa

customer_reviews.title: Quiet motor. Can turn off noisy, repetitive beeper.
customer_reviews.text: You can have the option of turning off the beeper! It’s simple, powerful enough and inexpensive. I bought a $200 one 18 months ago with a button door latch. The latch broke. Couldn’t open the door! It was a Cuisinart! Piece of junk. Go inexpensive and not regret it. This Toshiba has a pull open door. Hoping it lasts for years. We will see. Love it so far 1 month in.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ekstrom

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product!!!
customer_reviews.text: After having to return the first microwave due to shipping damage, I've now had this new replacement microwave for 3 days and the turntable motor is already making a grinding noise and barely spinning. I'm so disappointed, will never buy a Toshiba product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not real happy
customer_reviews.text: Glass plate in bottom shattered making a bag of microwave popcorn .
customer_reviews.author: tiff

customer_reviews.title: Works great but button plastic bubbling
customer_reviews.text: Got this on primeday and only complaint is two of the buttons are having the material distort. Not sure what caused and it's only cosmetic Edit: there was a protective wrap on the buttons which fit so well I couldn't tell. Once I took it off the buttons were perfect. I've had This microwave is for a few months now and loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Homestead

customer_reviews.title: Item defective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: We were super excited for a new microwave. We unboxed it and it looks amazing. When we plugged it in, it started running on its own right away. we unplugged it several times and contacted the support line. it appears that the connection between the door and the unit is defective and the only alternative is to replace it. wont buy another one of these
customer_reviews.author: BeachMom

customer_reviews.title: Great Value For Strong Microwave
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and powerful microwave. The only “issue” with it is that it is kinda hard to figure out how to input the exact time. We’ve just been using the 30 second button til it is the right time. Easy. It is way more powerful than out OTR microwave. Tales about half the time to heat things. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Basic microwave...the price should be MUCH lower
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microwave to match my stainless steel refrigerator...some small front parts match, but that's it. Microwave touted as smudge-proof...definitely NOT! Just putting it on the counter, left fingerprint smudges. Noise level? Not any quieter than the 15 year old microwave I was junking. I do not want the hassle of returning it, and it will probably work fine....I just wish it met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: ROXANNE R. TORRES

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Works great. Looks good, too. A friend actually saw it the other day and commented on how nice it looked. Seriously, who compliments you on your microwave? You know you have a pretty appliance when someone else notices.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hesson

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE. STOPPED WORKING after 3 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: GARBAGE PRODUCT. Stopped working after three months. Going through warranty on a $100 item is not even worth the hassle. 3 months is just pathetic. SAVE YOUR MONEY AND BUY A DIFFERENT MICROWAVE
customer_reviews.author: techguy0205AKo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just received and set up the new Toshiba Microwave. It has a nice modern appearance. It's just the right size for our kitchen; it has a light which stays on while in use; and, it has easy to understand control buttons. We especially like the fact that you can press one button to heat a cup of tea. Some units call for pressing a clearing or set button before beginning a procedure. That's not the care with the Toshiba. We use our microwave every day, so this one will see a lot of work.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Watch your food closely!!
customer_reviews.text: Oddly this microwave seems to virtually torch food in a matter of seconds so I have to be very careful using it. No matter if I use regular heat settings, defrost, or “soften”, food starts to pop and sizzle in 5-10 seconds. I defrosted a frozen breakfast sausage patty the other day and within 30 seconds the edges were defrosted and overcooked. I like the features but not fond of this overly potent microwave beam.
customer_reviews.author: Terronaut

product_meta.title: Toshiba EM131A5C-SS Microwave Oven with Smart Sensor, Easy Clean Interior, ECO Mode and Sound On/Off, 1.2 Cu.ft, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Size:1.2 Cu.ft| Color:Stainless SteelThis Toshiba 1.2 Cubic feet 1100 watt Stainless Steel microwave is the ideal size for apartment kitchens or office break rooms. Sensor reheating lets you optimally cook six of the most popular food items with the touch of a button. Choose from ten power levels up to 1100 watts. The large digital display has a clock function and can also display a countdown timer as well as the cooking time remaining. Program up to three favorite time and power combinations for additional one-touch convenience. Easily open or close the microwave with the large, easy-to grip door handle. The Stainless Steel exterior looks good in any kitchen. Voltage - 120V~ 60Hz.
feature_bullets: Stylish Stainless Steel with easy-to-clean interior, with external dimension (w x d x h): 20.5 x 17.1 x 12.8 inches, with internal Dimension (w x d x h): 13.07 x 15 x 9.5 inches
Pre-programmed sensor menu for optimum heating of popular foods like pizza, potato, vegetables and more
One touch popcorn button and two defrost settings – custom defrost and 1 pound Auto defrost
Equipped with power-saving eco mode, sound on/off option and child safety lock
1100 watts with 10 power settings, clock, and kitchen timer
Bright digital display, easy-to-read control panel, interior light and 12. 4 inches glass turntable
If you wish to mute the buzzer of the microwave, pleas long press on the button "8" For 3-5 seconds. The buzzer is automatically switched off after a long beep.
The keypad was covered by a protection film during the shipment. Please Peel it off before your first use.
1 year, please keep the packaging for contacting Toshiba after sales service and product returns.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars3,102 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
